Max Dovey

Projects Production Teaching CV Publications
Project Title

Cologne, What is Your Mother's Maiden Name?

Description

In this workshop participants explored methods to produce locative based experiences as part of Noordkaap’s post-futuristic taxi rides. Participants were introduced to site specific media art and explored methods used by the Situationists and the mathematical literature group Oulipo to produce their own artworks and happenings that took place as part of the taxi ride Cologne, What is Your Mother's Maiden Name?

Technologies

GPS,VR,Augmented Reality

Press

Akademie der Künste der Welt

Year

2019
